title: (x) Gatecrasher - custom typeface by tDR {David H}
content:
I would assume that the Gatecrasher typeface used in the past several years throughout their image is a custom typeface (tDR?)...   
   
 ![gatecrasher_typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112141020im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48426.gif)   
 [http://www.neverstandstill.com/crasher](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112141020/http:/www.neverstandstill.com/crasher)   
   
I am wondering if anyone would know about it or about typefaces that come close to it...?!?   
   
I came across one of Mr. Fewell's creations, Exhaust:   
 [http://www.unionfonts.com/2004/exhaust.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112141020/http:/www.unionfonts.com/2004/exhaust.html)   
Are there others?!
author: restate

comments.content:
I also think that this may be a custom typeface, created by the Designers Republic, for Gatecrasher..   
   
And, according to the [Typophile archives](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112141020/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/search.pl) ( and Google, of course ) it actually is.:   
 [www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28573.html?51769](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112141020/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28573.html?51769)   
   
_But, I still think that there are a few 'look-a-likes' out there.._   
   
Maybe everything started with a classic, ' [Digital Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112141020/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/)'..   
_( Designed in 1974, according to myFonts.. )_
